website_summaries.verdict: Merrell launched another ladies-specific kick that is suitable for the city cruising. The Merrell Around Town Lace displays a minimalistic casual look that offers comfortable features for the all-day use.Although this shoe received some gripe about its fit, its chic design with easy lace-up system lets its wearer hit the town with comfort and style. Exploring the concrete jungle will be a breeze with the Merrell Around Town Lace.
pros: The Merrell Around Town Lace can be bought at an affordable price range
Many purchasers liked the lightness of this shoe
The easy to wear design of the Around Town Lace has been commended by many ladies who are always on the go
A significant number of the reviewers disclosed that this shoe delivers all-day comfort
Few of them shared that they found this sneaker stylish and chic
This pair is suitable for all-day use, said some users
A couple of reviewers said that this shoe has enough ankle support
This shoe is easy to maintain, said some reviewers
cons: One reviewer complained that blisters formed when they wore the Merrell Around Town Lace without socks
Few disappointed buyers revealed that they found this shoe tad narrow
A couple of reviewers said that this shoe is long which felt like wearing a clown shoe

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me - fit not standard for the brand
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Merrell's for years now - the rule with them is if they don't feel right immediately out of the box, they are never going to be right. And these definitely didn't feel right. They are tight along the top - hard to get your foot into. And then they are loose around the width and shorter in the toe area. Just don't have the same fit that any of my other Merrell shoes have had. Going back tomorrow. Can recommend the Merrell Jungle Lace AC+ though - those fit like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Denise as Betty Bike

customer_reviews.title: Take 'Em for a Walk!
customer_reviews.text: These are great lace-ups. I'm on my feet all day and the support they give is wonderful. In fact, I had to walk a few miles to work a few weeks ago and these were the perfect shoes in which to do so. The first few times I wore them the leather felt a bit stiff but it softened right up after a few wearings. I love the look and the color is different... different in a good way! The grey-blue slate color goes with most of my wardrobe and is interesting without being loud or gaudy. Finally, these shoes are a step up from sneakers so they are unquestionably work appropriate for the high school where I teach.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I have a high instep so really couldn't even get the shoes on. I love the shoes and the look. Just wish they fit I need to return.
customer_reviews.author: D. Winters

customer_reviews.title: A must for try on IN PERSON!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these shoes, but the shoe was very narrow and the leather extremely stiff. I ordered a size 10; I usually wear a 9.5 but after reading the reviews (on other websites) I thought it would be best to go up 1/2 a size. The stiffness was addressed on other websites, but the reviewer stated that it did soften up quickly. Unfortunately I just found the shoe extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Buni Bunzel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and I expected them to be too wide as shoes generally are on me. They fit perfectly in length. I have always taken a size 6 and these fit me true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: They are exceptionally comfortable and really great if you work on your feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to buy these shoes in every color! They are exceptionally comfortable and really great if you work on your feet all day. Great product, fantastic brand and fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but should have ordered a bigger size that's why only 4 starts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made of quality material, but the shoe is too narrow - making a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel, comfortable foot bed
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel, comfortable foot bed, laces stay tied which can be a problem with smaller thin laces. Great look, I received many compliments the first day I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Not that cute but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit fine but I have no idea why they call them fashion sneakers....they are really pretty ugly. I kept them because they are comfortable and I needed something right now.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Great all around walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great all around walking shoes. A little stiff to get in to - but hope they will soften with use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: not for those with a wider foot
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but yikes are these uncomfortable. if you have even the slightest wide foot, forgetaboutit. these are not for you. very narrow where the laces are and an overall tight fit. cute if you want to look at them and never wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Around Town Lace Shoe, Huckleberry, 5 M US
product_meta.description: This on-the-move lace-up has full grain leather uppers, pigskin lining and contoured cork footbed. Urban explorers agree, fall is feeling good
feature_bullets: Pig skin lining for premium comfort and breathability
Cork covered M Select MOVE footbed treated with M Select FRESH shoe odor control
